content: In the desktop and web browser Zulip clients, I can set notification policy (mute vs default vs follow) at the level of individual topics/threads. But the Zulip iOS apps for iPhone and iPad seem to let me do that only at the channel level. Is that really the case, or have I missed some hidden feature?

This is supportd in https://blog.zulip.com/2024/12/12/new-flutter-mobile-app-beta/, by long-pressing on a topic when viewing it, for example. I think the old app supported it too, but haven't checked.
Thanks! I tried it and it does seem to work.
